attributes.action: Remove Abu Qatada perminantly from the U.K
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abu Qatada a known lieutenant for Osama Bin Laden is able to walk the british streets at the taxpayers expense. His freedom in the U.K makes a complete mockery of our national security and shows how weak our country has got.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
